info.title: windowsesu
info.description: Manage Multi-Access Keys (MAK) that enable Windows Extended Security Updates (ESU).

get.description: List all available Windows.ESU provider operations.

parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

agreementNumber.description: Agreement number under which the key is requested.

expirationDate.description: End of support of security updates activated by the MAK key.

installedServerNumber.description: Number of activations/servers using the MAK key.

isEligible.description: true if user has eligible on-premises Windows physical or virtual machines, and that the requested key will only be used in their organization; false otherwise.

osType.description: Type of OS for which the key is requested.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives
